Player History
Injured on 4/16/1966 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1968 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/7/1971 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1971 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Released by San Francisco on 4/1/1972...
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1975...
Injured on 7/7/1975 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/27/1975 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/2/1979...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/5/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $2,070,001 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1985, winning 2 games with a 2.70 ERA...
Injured on 4/13/1987 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/14/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Traded from Texas to Detroit on 5/19/1992 (Going to TEX: P T. Ritchie, RF M. Tucker. Going to DET: P T. Boggs, P J. Berenguer)...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
Drafted in 4th round, 65th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1995...
Injured on 5/5/1997 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...
